TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_mtalah_kwara_bwey_na_khoni, title = mtalah_kwara_bwey_na_khoni, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/mtalah_kwara_bwey_na_khoni} }

S.FORM: mtalah kwara bwey na khoni in'yanux Tayal bih llyung Klesan kya ga maki ci inbuyan yow na gaga na pkita kayal kwe, baley ci cnpngan ta p'yugan na kayal hiya ga knahul nya ubuy pkhngyan ro knita krryax. yani maha kwara knba'an ta kwe, skura ita Tayal ga piyang na yow, utux yow ga galan ta gnmilan na s'yanux ta, utux yow lwey ga kahul tkba' ta tgamil yow kwe ro p'aras hi'an na klhangan ta ita Tayal, kwe ga piyang myasa na knba'an, maki knita na cka Tayal hiya,"mita kayal"ro p'yugan na bhuyow kwara khoni, nya pkita maha kba' nya p'yuw kayal kwe, cyoli Tayal ga pgluw p'yuw na kayal kbaley ryax ro kita pntyagan ta. yani nyu sbiru suruw micu: bhuyow kwara bwey khoni' ro mtalah bwey ro mhutow kwara bwey laga, si ba'iy maha musa t'aring ryax na gaga mluyak uy la, baha mcya, kwara sinuw uy ga knahul ni'an naha bwey na khoni', misan ga tmwang klxun hi naha, ryax haca ga msyam ci ni'un hi na sinuw kwe. nanu yaca ita Tayal ga tegan ta mhutow kwara bwey na khoni' laga, mcpung maha ba'un ta t'aring mluyak uy la, ryax cpngan gaga na mluyak kwe ga aring mpuw utux byating ro beta s sa'ing byating babow skawas kya.

mtalah kwara bwey na khoni in'yanox Tayal bih llyong Klesan kya ga maki ci inboyan yow na gaga na pkita kayal kwe, baley ci cnpngan ta p'yogan na kayal hiya ga knahol nya oboy pkhngyan ro knita krryax. yani maha kwara knba'an ta kwe, skora ita Tayal ga piyang na yow, otox yow ga galan ta gnmilan na s'yanox ta, otox yow lwey ga kahol tkba' ta tgamil yow kwe ro p'aras hi'an na klhangan ta ita Tayal, kwe ga piyang myasa na knba'an, maki knita na cka Tayal hiya,"mita kayal"ro p'yogan na bhoyow kwara khoni, nya pkita maha kba' nya p'yow kayal kwe, cyoli Tayal ga pglow p'yow na kayal kbaley ryax ro kita pntyagan ta. yani nyo sbiro sorow mico: bhoyow kwara bwey khoni' ro mtalah bwey ro mhotow kwara bwey laga, si ba'iy maha mosa t'aring ryax na gaga mloyak oy la, baha mcya, kwara sinow oy ga knahol ni'an naha bwey na khoni', misan ga tmwang klxon hi naha, ryax haca ga msyam ci ni'on hi na sinow kwe. nano yaca ita Tayal ga tegan ta mhotow kwara bwey na khoni' laga, mcpong maha ba'on ta t'aring mloyak oy la, ryax cpngan gaga na mloyak kwe ga aring mpow otox byating ro beta s sa'ing byating babow skawas kya.
